entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
